articles.title: Biden says America will ban Russian oil; U.S. says up to 4,000 of Putin's soldiers have been killed - CNBC
articles.description: Ukraine's armed forces said Tuesday that the pace of Russia's invasion has "slowed significantly."
articles.content:
The Russian military on Tuesday declared a fresh cease-fire in five Ukrainian cities, according to state-run media. But evacuation routes will lead to Russia.

articles.title: New species of extinct vampire-squid–like cephalopod is the first of its kind with ten functional arms - Phys.org
